column1: Uchi////When we came at 7:30 p.m. and gave our name we were told it would be an hour and forty-five minute wait. My mom loves sushi and supposedly this is the best sushi spot in town so we said okay we'll wait. Well
column2: we've been standing and waiting well over two hours now and haven't been seated. Not only that but the hostess is completely ignoring us. You'd think in a fancy restaurant they'd at least be friendly and nice. Someone would come and say it's only going to be a little while longer... but no.
